    • Method Detail

      • iXassembler

        public static Iterable<String> iXassembler(Iterable<String> args)
        Prefixes each of the given assembler arguments with "-Xassembler" so that the compiler assembler driver will pass these arguments directly down to the linker rather than interpreting them itself. e.g. ["--fatal-warnings"] -> ["-Xassembler", "--fatal-warnings"]
        Parameters:
        args - arguments for the assembler.
        Returns:
        arguments to be passed to the compiler assembler driver.

      • resolveCxxSources

        public static ImmutableMap<String,CxxSource> resolveCxxSources(ImmutableMap<String,SourcePath> sources)
        Resolve the map of names to SourcePaths to a map of names to CxxSource objects.

      • createCompileBuildTarget

        public static BuildTarget createCompileBuildTarget(BuildTarget target,
                                   String name,
                                   boolean pic)
        Returns:
        a build target for a CxxCompile rule for the source with the given name.

      • getCompileOutputPath

        public static Path getCompileOutputPath(BuildTarget target,
                        String name)
        Returns:
        the output path for an object file compiled from the source with the given name.

      • createCompileBuildRule

        public static CxxCompile createCompileBuildRule(BuildRuleParams params,
                                BuildRuleResolver resolver,
                                CxxPlatform platform,
                                CxxPreprocessorInput preprocessorInput,
                                ImmutableList<String> compilerFlags,

        Returns:

        public static ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> createCompileBuildRules(BuildRuleParams params,

                                                    ImmutableList<String> compilerFlags,
                                                    boolean pic,

        Returns:
        a set of CxxCompile rules preprocessing, compiling, and assembling the given input CxxSource sources.
